title: Cowboys talking Super Bowl? Buccaneers have tough task in Philly, Chargers or Ravens better start, Brian Westbrook drops by
itunes:title: Cowboys talking Super Bowl? Buccaneers have tough task in Philly, Chargers or Ravens better start, Brian Westbrook drops by
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and DeAngelo Hall are surprised Amari Cooper is talking about Super Bowl hopes for the Cowboys. The Steelers could answer a lot of questions this weekend against the Seahawks while the Buccaneers have a tough task in Philly against the Eagles. The crew debates which team has had the more impressive start, the Chargers or the Ravens. Fmr RB Brian Westbrook drops by to talk Eagles and the Falcons' Cordarrelle Patterson. Plus, are We In or Out on the Chiefs?

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
